setting.name: Remember window positions and sizes
setting.description: Newly created windows get previous size and position

option.text: Same setting for all objects of same type

setting.name: Confirm quit
setting.description: Asks the "Are you sure you wish to exit FlameRobin?" question when closing.

setting.name: Minimize to system tray
setting.description: Minimizes to system tray instead of taskbar.

setting.name: When column has an user defined domain
Show columns and parameters in tree
setting.description: If checked the table and view columns and stored procedure parameters will be shown in tree

enables.name: When table, view or stored procedure is activated

setting.name: Automatically copy successfully executed statements to clipboard
When text is selected in editor, doing Execute should
Treat selected text as a single statement
setting.description: If unchecked the parser will search the selected text for multiple statements

setting.name: Characters needed for autocomplete
setting.description: If set to zero, user has to manually invoke the autocomplete list with Ctrl+Space

setting.name: Date format
setting.description:
The format contains the following letters:
d - day of month, 1-31
D - day of month, 01-31
m - month, 1-12
M - month, 01-12
y - year, 00-99
Y - year, 0000-9999
All other characters are copied

setting.name: Time format
setting.description:
The format contains the following letters:
h - hour, 0-24
H - hour, 00-24
m - minute, 0-59
M - minute, 00-59
s - second, 0-59
S - second, 00-59
All other characters are copied

setting.name: Re-format numbers
setting.description: If uncheked, prints decimal numbers as returned from server.

setting.name: When SELECT statement is executed, maximize the area that data grid occupies

enables.name: Records needed
enables.description: Maximizing will only happen when result set has that many records (or more)

setting.name: Log DML statements
setting.description:
Should the logging work for DML statements too.
If unchecked only DDL statements are logged.

setting.name: Enable logging to file
setting.description: Logs all successful DDL statements to file

enables.name: Add header to each statement
enables.description:
Should logging add a header showing the context in which statement was run:
FlameRobin version, database, username, timestamp

enables.name: Multiple files
enables.description:
To use incremental file numbers, place %d mark
where you want numbers to be inserted.
If you wish leading zeros use %0xd, where x is a number of digits (ex. %02d)

option.text: Log everything to a single file

enables.name: Incremental file numbers start at
enables.description: In case you want to start from some arbitrary number

setting.name: Enable logging to database
setting.description:
Logs all successful DDL statements to database.
This will create a table named FLAMEROBIN_LOG into your databases.

enables.name: Use generator instead of 1+max(id)
enables.description:
If not checked, logging will do a "select max(id)+1" to create
keys for flamerobin_log table. This can be slow if
there is a huge amount of records in it.
